Articles.Content: Not much, I Just want everyones guess on how KSP was thought of. I believe it all started during the Final days of the shuttle and it was a kind of commemoration.

HarvesteR and Moach are brothers, and they used to make matchstick rockets to launch tinfoil men that they called Kerbals. Harv always wanted to make a sandbox rocket game that would grow into a full-fledged game and you're in on the ground (or maybe 7th or 8th)

floor.

HarvesteR and Moach are brothers, and they used to make matchstick rockets to launch tinfoil men that they called Kerbals. Harv always wanted to make a sandbox rocket game that would grow into a full-fledged game and you're in on the ground (or maybe 7th or 8th)

floor.

Pretty much this, they said so on the 100% FLoB-ATHON when they were guests.
Perhaps harvestor was on a vomit comet one day, and saw fellow passengers turning green. Hence, Green astronauts!
